tag_list: web-development, portfolio, resume, create-site, personal-website, developer-blog, python-developer, django-developer, jquery-developer, nice-ui, user-interface, nice-site, useful-navigation, web-developer, freelance-developer, developer-services, web-pro
overview:
Experienced (more than 5 years old) developer in Python/Django. Have exelent skills in building UI with JQuery, Html and CSS.

Competencies: 1) Professionalism A professional approach to the stages of the development process. Precise adherence to coding standarts such as PEP8 and W3C. Supports all modern browsers. Analytical approach to problem solving. 2) Creativity Creative ability in programming. Willingness to create a fundamentally new ideas. Flexibility, originality, ability to see the essence of the problem, the ability to resist stereotypes. Options for improving existing solutions. Brainstorming. 3) Organized Ability to clearly define goals, set priorities and effectively use work time. Accounting for possible potential obstacles. Work performance in the planned terms. Using project management systems such as Trac and Unfuddle. 4) Decency Performance of the obligations. Tactfulness in communication. Politeness. Courtesy. Nondisclosure of the information on the project and not distribution of initial codes in mercenary or other purposes.
